org.activebpel.work.child
Class AeChildWorkManager

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.work.child.AeChildWorkManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeChildWorkCompletedListener, commonj.work.WorkManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeConfigAwareChildWorkManager
public class AeChildWorkManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements commonj.work.WorkManager, IAeChildWorkCompletedListener

Implements a work manager that limits the amount of work scheduled to a parent work manager.

Field Summary
private  int mMaxWorkCount
          The maximum number of work items to schedule from this work manager to its parent.
private  java.lang.String mName
          Name that identifies this work manager in log messages.
private  commonj.work.WorkManager mParentWorkManager
          The parent work manager.
private  int mScheduledCount
          The number of work items currently scheduled in the parent work manager from this work manager.
private  java.util.Collection mWaitingQueue
          WorkItems waiting to be scheduled to the parent work manager.
